column1: The Pit Room////- Mustard Potato Salad: OK
column2: even though I am not a BBQ fan
column3: I still am very aware of what good potato salad tastes like. THIS WAS THE BEST I HAVE EVER HAD. It had just the right amount of potatoes
column6: and whatever else was in it. It was not dry at all. I'm a huge fan of this! Rating: 5+
